notes.text: We now ensure that filter fields removed by adaptation are not visible again when we reload the page
We now provide an option to merge the control title and section title for custom sections
We now provide a building block for the tree table
We have improved the suggestions for recently entered values
We now correctly encode URL parameters when navigating away from the quickview popover
You can now use the manifest to customize the export settings of a column
We now provide support for consuming design time cards in SAP Collaboration Manager
We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key
We've removed the fixed contentWidth for the draft indicator popover
Now we get the correct label from annotations for the filter fields where manifest settings are passed without the label property.
You can now use the Share as Card option to share the design time cards created by the card generator, if the cards are provided for an object page
We’ve resolved an issue related to the execution of actions for multiple entries in a table
You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
We now support the @Common.ExternalID annotation for fields that have a technical ID as the key
In the header of a contact card, we now display round borders for images and icons pertaining to people, otherwise we display square borders
In the header of a quickview, we now display round borders for images and icons pertaining to people, otherwise we display square borders
We now clear the messageTargetProperty to ensure the navigation works correctly after saving changes on the subobject page
We now support an experimental feature to dynamically instantiate specific building blocks using controller coding
The contact card now shows the contact's availability from Microsoft Teams
We now ensure that only the 'Delete' action is available in the context menu for an empty row
We have resolved an issue with row selection in a context-dependent value help dialog with multiple selections
We now correctly apply the filter for drafts, even when the filter bar is hidden
We now ensure that card manifest can be created with deep nested app manifest
Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
We now ensure that the radial micro chart is rendered without the TargetValue annotation
We now ensure that the MultiValue fields don't create additional requests in display mode
Value is now marked as selected in value help on the list report
We’ve reduced the number of API calls to improve the performance when loading a quick view
We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
We now ensure that the value help of MultiValue fields in action parameter dialogs works correctly
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
SideEffects network requests applied on structural changes like create and delete, that rely on the MuliValueField, are now performed in the correct sequence
We've resolved an issue with the DateTime format for default values when merging it with the startup parameter
We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
We’ve resolved an issue where values selected from the value help could not be removed in the group view of the Adapt Filters dialog
We’ve resolved an issue where the multi-input field did not appear
We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
We now consider the intent parameters of  SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
We now avoid duplicate GET requests when a user clicks the Go button in the filter bar of a value help dialog
